channel.title: How to add an NPC? [317]
channel.description:
my server has a dragon platebody but there is no monster who drops it. So I wanna make a KBD who drops a D plate and hit 50's and spwns at these coordinates: X:3087, Y:3541.
Can you tell me how to do that step by step, because I keep failing and getting errors.
Pls help me out

item.title: How to add an NPC? [317]
item.dc:creator: @amt amt
item.description:
@amt wrote:

I know spawning and drops a lil
open autospawn add

spawn = npcid 3084 3488 0 0 0 0 0 1

I think u can figure out that.

then open npcdrops

//KBD npc item ammount odds
npcdrop = 2028 4732 1 1
npcdrop = 2028 4734 1 1
npcdrop = 2028 4736 1 1
npcdrop = 2028 4738 1 1
npcdrop = 2028 4740 200 1
npcdrop = 2028 526 1 100

Read full topic
